Uses of Interface
gil.IGIL

Packages that use IGIL
gil   
 

Uses of IGIL in gil
 

Classes in gil that implement IGIL
 class GIL
          This is the main entry class for the GIL.
 

Methods in gil that return IGIL
static IGIL GIL.instance()
          Returns an instance to the only GIL object instance (Singelton pattern).
 

Methods in gil with parameters of type IGIL
static void GIL.injectInstance(IGIL newInstance)
          To make it possible to inject mocks for unit tests.
